DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 / QUARTERFINALS ; SPOTLIGHT ; THE OTHER GUYS AREN ' T BAD EITHER
DOC.TEXT: Romario was the most popular topic of conversation at the Dutch team ' s news conference.But he ' s not the only Brazilian player the_Netherlands respects . " It ' s not good to talk only about Romario , " Dutch defender Ronald Koeman said . " The whole Brazil team is very good . They have a lot of strong players . . . . This is two great teams . This game is more_than Koeman of Holland and Romario of Brazil or any other player. " HELENE ELLIOTT
